text: 13:14 1 Samuel 15:28; Onger Akaba 89:20; Aposel 13:22Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn dughiar ruarimɨn atrivimɨn ikian kogham. Nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akabar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, gumazir aghuir mam ginaba, gumazir a bar ifongezim, a bar bizir God ifongezibar amuam. A God ifongezir arazibar gɨn zuir gumazim. Eghtɨ a Godɨn gumazamizibar atrivimɨn ikiam.”
